text: @antonioguterres @UN @UN tackles ‘infodemic’ of misinformation and cybercrime in COVID-19 crisis... is this a joke?  I hope UN documents every single action taken to censor... I mean tackle misinformation?  I hope US Tax dollars aren't used for this malarkey.
